#include <cv.h>
    #include <highgui.h>
    
    using namespace cv;
    
    int main( int argc, char** argv )
    {
    	Mat image;
    	image = imread( argv[1], 1 );
    
    	if (argc != 2 || !image.data)
    	{
    		printf( ""No image data \n"" );
    		return -1;
    	}
    
    	namedWindow( ""Display Image"", CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE );
    	imshow( ""Display Image"", image );
    
    	waitKey(0);
    
    	return 0;
    }
